articles.description: Kelly, 55, was found guilty on three counts of child pornography but was acquitted of a conspiracy to obstruct justice. He was convicted by a New York jury of sex trafficking in June.
articles.content: A federal jury on Wednesday convicted R. Kelly of several child pornography charges in his hometown of Chicago, delivering another legal blow to a singer who used to be one of the biggest R&B sta… [+4917 chars]

articles.title: Prince William will claim £1million a year from Cornwall's dead thanks to medieval law - Cornwall Live
articles.description: Prince William's total annual income from the Duchy of Cornwall is likely to be more than £20m
articles.content: Centuries-old rules will allow Prince William to collect around £1m of intestate wealth left by Cornish people each year now that he has been made Duke of Cornwall following the accession of his fath… [+2307 chars]
